trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Nederland
There were no other sightings in Nederland on or around November 9th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and a friend sitting in yard talking. We both noticed I brought light. In looked like a beam. We sat watching it in the same stop for over 30 minutes. It went away then came back. We now have have another other witness.
Summary: flashing light in the sky. not moving. no sound. not a spot light. very bright
